mapper.insert: INSERT INTO immune_plan( factory_num, crowd_num, immune_eartag, immune_time, immune_kind, immune_way, immune_quality, immune_during, operator, remark, is_pass1, is_pass2, gmt_create ) VALUES( #{immunePlanModel.factoryNum}, #{immunePlanModel.crowdNum}, #{immunePlanModel.immuneEartag}, #{immunePlanModel.immuneTime}, #{immunePlanModel.immuneKind}, #{immunePlanModel.immuneWay}, #{immunePlanModel.immuneQuality}, #{immunePlanModel.immuneDuring}, #{immunePlanModel.operator}, #{immunePlanModel.remark}, #{immunePlanModel.isPass1}, #{immunePlanModel.isPass2}, #{immunePlanModel.gmtCreate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM immune_plan WHERE factory_num = #{facctoryNum} AND immune_time BETWEEN #{gmtCreate} AND #{gmtTrans}
SELECT * FROM immune_plan WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND crowd_num = #{crowdNum} AND immune_time = #{immuneTime}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM immune_plan WHERE factory_num = #{factoryNum} AND immune_time = #{immuneTime}
